name: Ancient Engineering Device
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Energy Infused Crystal" "267749" #L "Inactive Ancient Engineering Device" "267748" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Engineer" "267714" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Energy Infused Crystal + Inactive Ancient Engineering Device = #L "Activated Ancient Engineering Device" "267750" Skills: | ME1125 | ------------------------------ Activated Ancient Engineering Device + Crystalised Memories of a Engineer = #L "Ancient Engineering Device" "267751" Skills: | ME1500 | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Reusable tool handy for tradeskillers.
